title: Why being hated at spawn is bad.
body:
Everybody hates me because I'm the best Fiora.

Riot hates me...

Everyone on the message board hates me and it's all because I can beat any LCS champ.

You guys are jealous.

But what happens to hated players?

If you say that you are the best Fiora in game your jungle will refuse to gank you so they can call you bad.

Eventually you will get 3,4 or 5vs 1 under your turret and the team will refuse to come to the aid of the carry so they can talk smack about how bad they are.

But does that make the true carry bad or are the teammate bad for not helping when you ping?

The team is bad.

The people in the message boards will down vote this post because they are also bad and want to see you on the bottom.

When you refuse to help the carry the team loses of course but at least you got to call the true carry bad right?

That's the point of every game it seems.

To make someone pay instead of helping the team.

Nobody cares about winning they just want to steal your buff and laugh.

Nobody cares about feeding the carry because they would rather lose than help a Fiora.

If you have anything to teach you are going to get reported for explaining why they are bad.

I've lost many accounts that way.

Well this is why you are bad. You tell the best player they are bad all game instead of helping them get 1st blood.

You refuse to poke because you want to see the best player die and steal the kill they were working on so they can be "bad" and you can be "good."

The best player could of stayed alive if you came a few seconds earlier but you would rather watch them die.

Teammates are actually worse than the enemy team because the PRETEND to help just to watch you die or so they can talk more smack.
